# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-102">在 Outlook.com 中回覆</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-103">若要一次回覆一封郵件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-104">在郵件清單中，選擇您想要回覆的郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-105">在最右邊的 [郵件] 窗格中，選取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-106">**回覆**或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-107">**全部回覆**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-108">輸入您的郵件，然後選取 [**傳送**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-109">若要自動回覆的所有郵件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-110">跳至</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-111">**設定** > **檢視所有的 Outlook 設定** > **郵件** > **自動回覆**若要開啟 [您的[自動回覆設定](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-112">選取 [**開啟自動回覆**切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-113">選取**傳送回覆只能在一段時間期間**] 核取方塊，可讓您：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-114">當您選擇時，只能傳送回覆。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-115">如果您不需要設定一段時間，直到您關閉自動回覆仍停留在上。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-116">封鎖您的行事曆</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-117">自動拒絕新邀請</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-118">拒絕] 和 [我的會議取消這段期間</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-119">在 [郵件] 方塊中，輸入後立即訊息的時間內傳送給人員。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-120">若要僅傳送回覆給您的連絡人，請選取 [**傳送回覆僅連絡人**] 核取方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-121">選取**儲存**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0e5ef-122">深入了解[在 Outlook.com 中的自動轉寄](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0e5ef-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
